programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o duserrnd.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1
k1 duserrnd 1 printk 0, k1 asig poscil .5, 220*k1, 2 ;multiply frequency with random value outs asig, asig
endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore> f1 0 -20 -41 2 .1 8 .9 ;choose 2 at 10% probability, and 8 at 90%
f2 0 8192 10 1
i1 0 2 e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
